testcase.name: Verify Home Page Elements
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the UrbanLadder home page...............................passed Then Top Offers section should be displayed.................................passed And Recommended for You section should be displayed.........................passed And Search bar should be functional.........................................passed

testcase.name: User Registration (Sign Up) - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the Sign Up link under profile icon.....................passed When I enter "sample163@demo.com" and "Hello@163" for registration..........passed And I click on the Sign Up button...........................................passed Then the user should be successfully logged in..............................passed

testcase.name: Edit Account Settings - Change Password - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the profile under profile icon..........................passed And I clicks on edit button.................................................passed And I enter my name in "Aparna Ramya".......................................passed And I enter my mobile number to "7607633686"................................passed And I click on the Change Password option...................................passed And I update my password to "Lock@163" and confirm it as "Lock@163".........passed And I click on the Update button............................................passed Then I get "Account updated" message as success.............................passed

testcase.classname: Search and Filter Functionality on Urban Ladder
testcase.name: Search and filter products - #1.1
testcase.system-out: When I search for "sofa"....................................................passed Then I should see search results for "sofa".................................passed When I navigate to "Recommended" dropdown...................................passed And I select "New Arrivals".................................................passed Then I should see the products sorted by New Arrivals.......................passed When I navigate to the price filter dropdown................................passed And I select the price option "₹53,081-₹104,560"............................passed Then I should see the filter applied successfully...........................passed

testcase.classname: Product Details Page Validation and Interaction
testcase.name: End-to-End Product Selection, Validation, Wishlist, and Cart Addition
testcase.system-out: When I find and click on "Taran Teak Wood Sofa".............................passed Then I validate the product title...........................................passed And I check if "Taran Teak Wood Sofa" is sold out...........................passed Then I validate the product description.....................................passed And I validate the product price............................................passed When I click on the wishlist icon...........................................passed And I navigate to the wishlist page.........................................passed Then I validate that "Taran Teak Wood Sofa" is added to the wishlist........passed And I click on the product from the wishlist................................passed When I click on the "Add to Cart" button....................................passed Then I validate that "Taran Teak Wood Sofa" is added to the cart............passed

testcase.name: Add items to cart, update quantity, remove item, and proceed to checkout
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the shopping cart page........................................passed When I update the quantity of the product to "2"............................passed Then the quantity should be updated in the cart.............................passed When I remove the product from the cart.....................................passed Then the cart should be empty...............................................passed When I navigate to the Wishlist page........................................passed And I select a product from the Wishlist....................................passed And I add the product to the cart again.....................................passed And I click on the checkout button..........................................passed Then the message Product Purchased should be displayed......................passed
